name: Mosselberg On Grotto Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon and what an amazing surprise. The attention to detail and service is outstanding. We were lucky enough to have Martine, the chef to ourselves for two nights as we were out of season and what an experience it was; a perfectly cooked menu tailored to our wants with friendly service and great wine recommendations.
reviews.title: What an amazing place this is!

reviews.text: The large rooms are a mixture of modern architecture and traditional furniture with stunning views from the huge shuttered windows. The beds were huge and very comfortable. The building set in a quiet suburban street is full of stunning architecture in an enclosed modern court yard, but within walking distance from grotto beach - where we were lucky enough to see dolphins playing in the waves. It is a short drive from Hermanus town centre, but you can get snacks from either the beech or a small shop/cafe down the road.
reviews.title: Does it get better than this?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very helpful in phoning and booking alternative places to eat and giving recommendations for activities such as shark diving - a must if you are staying so close to shark alley!!!
reviews.title: On Cloude Nine

reviews.text: we really cannot find fault in Mosselberg and will be returning with our friends in tow as soon as we can!!
reviews.title: Simply the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An exceptionally elegant villa looked after by an exceptionally elegant manageress.
reviews.title: Amazing "beachhouse"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel after being on a whale watching trip which wasn't very good, if only we had known what a fabulous location, views and bed rooms The Mosselberg had we wouldn't gone on the expensive boat trip. All the staff were very pleasant, helpful. and the breakfast was perfect. There was nothing you could fault at all - perfect.
reviews.title: Perfect hotel, perfect location, perfect staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Awesome. Architect designed. Huge funky rooms. Great beds. Quiet.
reviews.title: What a find!

reviews.text: Quite expensive by SA standards, but not outrageous by UK standards.
reviews.title: An outstanding 1st class property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Grotto Beach is the best place to stay in hermanus - most hotels/B&Bs are in town, which has no beach. Grotto Beach is blue flag and one the best beaches you'll truly ever find - esepcially if you like a walk/run on the beach! It is approx 3 clicks out of town but what does that matter.
reviews.title: Exceptional, mind blowing, fantastic!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fabulous funky modern rooms. Smallish decking area for sunbathing with great views.
reviews.title: Exceptional.... yep. that's it: exceptional

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We came across the details for Mosselberg in an SA tourist board brochure we picked up during the course of our honeymoon travelling around South Africa. It is listed as a 5 star guesthouse, but is more like a boutique hotel.
reviews.title: Amazing Mosselberg

reviews.text: When we arrived at Mosselberg we instantly felt the serenity of the place: a beautiful house facing the magnificient Grotto beach.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to unwind

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had 2 rooms: the whale suite (which is the best suite of the entire house) and the sugarbird suite. Spacious is not enough to describe the rooms, it was huge!
reviews.title: Relaxing Beach Break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Both of them are overlooking the beach and the sea and at night in you bed you can hear the sound of the waves on the beach.
reviews.title: One of the best places to stay in Hermanus

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: With the spyglass we could see the whales swimming in the Bay. We made fire in the chimney and enjoy a nice bath in the beautiful bathrooms.
reviews.title: Been often and only dont return as we know have our own house in Hermanus

reviews.text: The friendly staff gave us advice and booked a nice restaurant fo us.
reviews.title: AMAZING! Highly recommended.

aka: Mosselberg On Grotto Beach Hotel Hermanus
description: African Pride Mosselberg on Grotto Beach is a luxurious 5 star Country House with spectacular views of the majestic Mosselberg mountains and the Blue Flag Grotto Beach in Hermanus. From June to November you can see the Southern Right whales from your bedroom lounge! Designed by an award-winning architect, Mosselberg Country House has a pool and a huge deck on the sea side. Each room has its own entrance, a sea-facing balcony and the option of king-size or 2 single beds. Bring the kids, there are sleeper couches available in some of the bedrooms. The rooms are luxuriously appointed with a bar fridge, coffee kitchenette, safe, TV, under floor heating, fans, and full en-suite bathrooms with twin basins and heated towel rails. Wake up to our world class, superb continental and English breakfasts, which are served on the deck or on the veranda around the pool. If outdoor adventure is on the cards; there is access to a mountain bike trail, fantastic walks and scenic hikes on the beach, in the Fernkloof Nature Reserve or along the cliff path. Mosselberg is also conveniently located 4.5km from the Hermanus Golf course and 24km from Arabella. With activities suited to all weather conditions, choose from a relaxing swim in our pool, read a book in the lounge or play a game of pool.
